001package apprepo;
002
003import java.io.BufferedReader;
004import java.io.FileReader;
005import java.io.IOException;
006import java.util.ArrayList;
007import java.util.List;
008
009import jakarta.servlet.Servlet;
010import jakarta.servlet.ServletConfig;
011import jakarta.servlet.ServletException;
012import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
013import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
014import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
015
016
017
018/**
019 * Servlet implementation class NextGenRentServlet
020 */
021public class NextGenRentServlet extends HttpServlet {
022        private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
023        ServletConfig configNextGen; 
024    /**
025     * @see HttpServlet#HttpServlet()
026     */
027    public NextGenRentServlet() {
028        super();
029        // TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
030    }
031
032        /**
033         * @see Servlet#init(ServletConfig)
034         */
035        public void init(ServletConfig config) throws ServletException {
036                configNextGen =  config; 
037        }
038
039        /**
040         * @see Servlet#getServletConfig()
041         */
042        public ServletConfig getServletConfig() {
043                
044                return configNextGen;
045        }
046
047        /**
048         * @see Servlet#getServletInfo()
049         */
050        public String getServletInfo() {
051                // TODO Auto-generated method stub
052                return null; 
053        }
054
055        /**
056         * @see HttpServlet#doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
057         */
058        protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {
059                
060                //response.getWriter().append("Served at: ").append(request.getContextPath());
061List<Application> applications = new ArrayList<>();
062        
063        // Read data from the file
064        String filePath = getServletContext().getRealPath("/data/applications.txt");
065        try (BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(filePath))) {
066            String line;
067            Application app = null;
068            while ((line = br.readLine()) != null) {
069                if (line.startsWith("Name:")) {
070                    app = new Application();
071                    app.setName(line.substring(6).trim());
072                } else if (line.startsWith("Description:")) {
073                    app.setDescription(line.substring(13).trim());
074                } else if (line.startsWith("Organization:")) {
075                    app.setOrganization(line.substring(14).trim());
076                } else if (line.startsWith("Platforms:")) {
077                    app.setPlatforms(line.substring(10).trim());
078                } else if (line.startsWith("Links:")) {
079                    String linksStr = line.substring(7).trim();
080                    // Remove brackets and split by commas
081                    String[] linksArray = linksStr.substring(1, linksStr.length() - 1).split(", ");
082                    app.setLinks(linksArray);
083                } else if (line.startsWith("Price:")) {
084                    app.setPrice(line.substring(7).trim());
085                    applications.add(app);
086                }
087            }
088        } catch (IOException e) {
089            e.printStackTrace();
090        }
091        
092        // Set applications attribute to be accessed in JSP
093        //request.setAttribute("applications", applications);
094        request.getSession().setAttribute("applications", applications);
095        // Forward to JSP to display the data
096        request.getRequestDispatcher("/displayApplications.jsp").forward(request, response);
097        }
098
099        /**
100         * @see HttpServlet#doPost(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
101         */
102        protected void doPost(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {
103                // TODO Auto-generated method stub
104                //doGet(request, response);
105        }
106
107}
